name: Mr.HeartAttack
description: This is a goofy game based on the sad story of the crescent hotel. The Hotel was made into a cancer hospital in 1886 obviously the spring water they claimed cure cancer which caused millions of deaths. In this game The Player Must Complete 4 Levels The Tutorial, The Dark Hallway, Broken Elevator and Room Danger at the end of room danger you will escape the hotel.The main item to collect the night vision goggle the goggles allow you to see real platforms and not ghost platforms.
